name: The Streets of San Francisco
description: My triip will take you through the streets of downtown San Francisco, while we get up close and personal with some of the city's beautiful architecture and colorful street life. We will venture down to the Embarcadero and get some of the most iconic shots of the bay, while getting insight from a local who knows special tricks that most visitors will miss. Sure, you will get the iconic shots of the city that everyone has to get but this triip also encourages you to look outside the box and put yourself into the environment of the financial district.
